intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: IF 'Select the process type' = 'India' THEN 'Process Type' = 'DOM IN'; IF 'Select the process type' = 'International' THEN 'Process Type' = 'INT'
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Not visible, IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT.

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: Dropdown options for 'Group key/Corporate Group' are filtered based on selected 'Account Group/Vendor Type' value using reference table 1.3 column 2
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3.

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: IF 'Account Group/Vendor Type' IN ['ZDES', 'ZDOM', 'ZRPV', 'ZONE'] THEN 'Vendor Domestic or Import' = 'Domestic'; IF 'Account Group/Vendor Type' IN ['ZIMP', 'ZSTV', 'ZDAS'] THEN 'Vendor Domestic or Import' = 'Import'
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Default behaviour is Invisible, If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: IF 'Select the process type' = 'India' THEN 'Country' = 'India' AND non-editable; IF 'Select the process type' = 'International' THEN 'Country' is editable dropdown with values from reference table 1.1
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown. For dropdown values will be Column 2 - Column 5 of reference table 1.1.

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: When 'Country' is selected, derive 'Country Name' from column 5 of reference table 1.1
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: When 'Country' is selected, derive 'Country Code' from column 2 of reference table 1.1
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Not visible, If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: Dropdown options for 'Company Code' are filtered based on 'Process Type' value (DOM IN or INT) using column 1 of reference table 1.2
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: Mobile number validation rules are applied based on selected 'Country' value
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Mobile Number Validation based on the country selection

depends_on.field_name: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?

intra_panel_dependencies.rule_description: IF 'Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?' = 'Yes' THEN visible AND mandatory; ELSE invisible AND non-mandatory
intra_panel_dependencies.original_logic: Make visible and Mandatory if "Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?" is Yes otherwise it should be invisible and non-mandatory.

depends_on.field_name: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)?

dependency_chains.description: Select the process type drives multiple downstream fields
chain: Select the process type → Process Type

dependency_chains.description: Account Group/Vendor Type drives related dropdown and derivation fields
chain: Account Group/Vendor Type → Group key/Corporate Group
Account Group/Vendor Type → Vendor Domestic or Import

dependency_chains.description: Additional domestic mobile numbers controlled by single toggle
chain: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)? → Mobile Number 2 (Domestic)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)? → Mobile Number 3 (Domestic)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)? → Mobile Number 4 (Domestic)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (India)? → Mobile Number 5 (Domestic)

dependency_chains.description: Additional import mobile numbers controlled by single toggle
chain: Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)? → Mobile Number 2 (Import)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)? → Mobile Number 3 (Import)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)? → Mobile Number 4 (Import)
Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)? → Mobile Number 5 (Import)
Do you wish to add additional email addresses? → Email 2

Do you wish to add additional mobile numbers (Non-India)?
Do you wish to add additional email addresses?
